languages.text: "Я весьма рассчитываю на то, что в вашей компании мне не придется скучать так же, как за столом в своем кабинете".
"I am counting on life in your retinue being more exciting than sitting behind a desk in my office."
languages.original_text: "Я весьма рассчитываю на то, что в вашей компании мне не придется скучать так же, как за столом в своем кабинете".

traits.locale_text: "I am counting on life in your retinue being more exciting than sitting behind a desk in my office."

languages.text: “希望与你同行的旅途，比坐在办公室桌子后面会更有趣。”
languages.original_text: "I am counting on life in your retinue being more exciting than sitting behind a desk in my office."

traits.locale_text: “希望与你同行的旅途，比坐在办公室桌子后面会更有趣。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Cuento con que trabajar a su servicio sea más emocionante que un trabajo de despacho».
languages.original_text: "I am counting on life in your retinue being more exciting than sitting behind a desk in my office."

traits.locale_text: «Cuento con que trabajar a su servicio sea más emocionante que un trabajo de despacho».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « J'espère avoir une vie plus palpitante au sein de votre entourage que derrière mon bureau. »
languages.original_text: "I am counting on life in your retinue being more exciting than sitting behind a desk in my office."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère avoir une vie plus palpitante au sein de votre entourage que derrière mon bureau. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, das Leben in Ihrem Gefolge ist aufregender, als in meinem Büro an einem Schreibtisch zu sitzen."
languages.original_text: "I am counting on life in your retinue being more exciting than sitting behind a desk in my office."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, das Leben in Ihrem Gefolge ist aufregender, als in meinem Büro an einem Schreibtisch zu sitzen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am counting on life in your retinue being more exciting than sitting behind a desk in my office."

languages.text: 「オフィスで椅子に腰掛けているより、あんたの仲間になって生きる方がワクワクするって当てにしてるよ」
languages.original_text: "I am counting on life in your retinue being more exciting than sitting behind a desk in my office."

traits.locale_text: 「オフィスで椅子に腰掛けているより、あんたの仲間になって生きる方がワクワクするって当てにしてるよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Maiyetindeki yaşantımın, ofisimde masabaşında oturmaktan daha heyecanlı olacağını tahmin ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am counting on life in your retinue being more exciting than sitting behind a desk in my office."

traits.locale_text: "Maiyetindeki bir yaşamın, ofisimdeki bir masanın arkasında oturmaktan daha heyecan dolu olacağını tahmin ediyorum."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
